item.title: Enhancing Attribute Autocomplete Functionality - Auto Correction and Type Validation
item.description: Background # What are operator properties # Texera workflows consist of operators. Every operator has properties as the parameters of its data-process function. For example, in Figure 1, the “Filter” operator has three properties, Attribute, Condition, and Value. Some attribute properties accept input attribute names as values, usually describing the attributes that the operator applies. In this operator, Attribute is an attribute property, and price is the attribute to which the filter will apply.
